Class FileAutoChecker

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      fiftyone.mobile.detection.FileAutoChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class FileAutoChecker
extends TimerTask

Class Run by the Timer object in the Factory51D Object. Used to ensure that all instances have the latest data available on the file system.

Version:
2.2.9.1
Author:
51Degrees.mobi
